content: Just as good as I remember it from back in the day, well worth another playthrough
Does not work.
Excellent experience so far. It's a fabulous adventure game although reasonably dark in tone and subject. If you know who Thomas Ligotti is then this for you.
Unpacking files failed
Like others "unpacking files failed" was unable to get reply from developer support via email and contact on their site. Shame..
Brand new Samsung ultra 5G phone ...wont even unpack the files
Great port of the original game!
Unpacking files failed. Game won't open beyond this error screen. Pixel 4a.
Wouldn't open
Very absorbing
Was 5 stars but it stopped running. It won't open anymore. I'm not sure when it stopped working but I did try to uninstall and reinstall but to no avail. Wish I wouldn't have paid for it.
Just as i remember

Amazing epic game! I've been a huge fan of this game for years and I am so glad to have it on my tablet now! The cursor is a bit buggy but the gameplay is great! I love dark psychological thrill this game gives, it's like what would your mind would go through instants before dying.

Everything works fine still as 2020 comes to a close. Unpacked fine, and keep in mind you have to hold the screen to walk around in a direction around your character. You also must re-equip your hands, thus dequiping an item in order to return to being able to interact with objects normally. The feedback for this is a bit questionable. There are also some items/objects in the environment that you can combine by clicking on them one after another, not needing to add them to your inventory.
Great game. Movement was a bit difficult sometimes. I enjoyed it.
Blast from the past
Dotemu has put out some great quality ports of classic computer games. I love playing through these games again.

I love this classic three quarter view style game. Great dialogue, story, and nice graphics for the time. Characters are all well thought out with their own personalities to go with. Thank for bringing this back. Once I discovered changing the controls, I enjoyed even more!

This is a game my mother played when I was a child and I've been looking for it. I was very excited and enjoyed playing through the first few challenges. However, upon re-entering the game and loading the auto-save, I cannot interact with the scene. My cursor moves, and characters in the scene move, but I cannot move or click on anything. Very, very disappointed.
Worth it if you like andventure/puzzle games

Yesssssssssüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩüî•üî•üî•üî•üî•üò±üò±üò±üò±üò±üò±üò±üò±üòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòç. I just got the email from steam that it was on sale and boom I find it here instead üòÉüòÉüòÉ

Update 8/11/2020:Android 11, the game fails to unpack files even with storage permissions This game is AWESOME! If you're into point and click adventure and solving those kinds of puzzles then this is the game for you. I loved playing The Hunt for the Lost Treasure and then played The Mystery of Blackthorn Castle before this. They are both good starter games in the genre. This game (I know if comes from PC) was a completely different level! What a storyline, characterization, creativity - all blows the top off! If you had to pay for a game - make it this. Caution: There are two places in the game where it's tough. 1. When you're Grimwall, you need to go into the room of your friend to collect a 'sledge hammer or broom'. If you're on a mobile it's frustrating to click on it because the touch is continuously registered on the 'heater' behind it. Took me several tried to 'get' it. You can try to attach a mouse to get more accurate. 2. When you're at the second last chapter - you will probably need external help for the sequence of tiles to press.
Nostalgic. But sometimes it skips dialogue without you even trying to skip it!

Classic, loved it on PC in the 90s, love this port too. The story is indescribably genius, one of the best storylines ever. Brilliant how each level is just another version or symptom of the PC's mental state.
Just like the old days!
Faithful translation of the best point and click in the history of videogames. Not wild about the touch controls or touch controls in general but for this genre it is ituitive.
Classic good game but the control on phone is terrible. Couldn't finish the maze because of it.
Just awesome loved this game. Length is perfect. Entertaining and different.

Amazing classic game! I had this on the PC years ago, and it is one of those games that always sticks in your mind once you have played it through to the end. Great puzzles, memorable characters and twisted locations, each with their own clever puzzles and mini storylines. Just completed the game again on mobile now, and it's still as great as I remember it! They dont make them like this anymore!
Really nice! This takes me back memory lane. The controls is a bit funky at times and takes a bit getting used to but overall they did a great job porting this to mobile phones.
A Nostalgia trip one of my favorite childhood games that I should have not played at a young age
Painful archaic control scheme.

Fantastic game! Although I had to resort frequently to a text walkthrough I found I loved this point & click adventure. It is quite lengthy and the chapters vary to the point that you almost get several games in one without relearning controls, etc. Great voice and sound and the gfx are very creepy but control can be a tad glitchy. I like. Bring me more!
One of my favourite games
Its sames the PC version. Amazing Game great controls. Smith cut scenes. Love the game
It's a good Game
Played this game on windows 95.... Enjoyed it a lot.. Just wanted to say thank you for getting it on android...
Best game ever!!!

I'm giving a 4 star since the price is less than $5. The game is not as well ported as IHNM,AIMS. Had multiple bugs and even a bad save state at one point. And without the option to zoom, it's near impossible to complete some puzzles since they require pixel perfect accuracy which is not easy via finger. play with a stylus or you will be put in the sanitarium yourself. I was able to complete the game however and I loved the game itself. Thanks for porting it, hopefully you can improve the Port.
The nostalgia is real! I feel like a kid again!
interesting story and puzzles, but the controls are terrible. trying tap what you want can be really frustrating. they really need to fix the interface.
Just as creepy and fantastic as I remember- excellent port!

Good port but a lot of weird bugs involving the integration of mouse to touch screen. For example the second stage when you walk by the barn a lot of weird glitchy stuff happens sometimes to where you even have to close out of the game or fine a weird work around because the cursor gets locked. Otherwise it plays similar just hope they tweak these issues which hinder the experience.
Ok game
Awesome game! I played on PC a long time ago. The controls are difficult to walk around (especially during the electricity part. But overall a great game!!
This game is impossible to play without being able to pinch zoom in and out. It's too hard to see and use small objects. Too bad because the game is great.
Great game but freezes and shuts down a lot.

I loved this game when it first came out on PC. The mobile version is just as good, but I will warn that the controls are a bit wonky at times (especially when trying to interact with NPCs and objects). It is not so obvious at first, but as you progress through the game and even on the last chapter, it will get much more frustrating.
I had this on Pc years ago, and the game froze before I could finish it. Now I finally get the chance! Loving it so far! Brings back memories!
Good game hope number 2 comes out as enjoyed this game very much
Awesome game!!!
At the part with the bear and gold key to open the chest it will not let me pick up the dam key by bear no matter how many times I click. So confused
Oh my gosh, thank you so much. I'm so glad to see this again! I was so excited when I saw this and all the original charm is conserved. So happy!

An amazing experience and game. I played it years ago on a computer and this port is not so far behind the original version in terms of overall quality. The controls can be a bit difficult sometimes, but the story, graphics, music and characters more than make up for it. Completely recommended for fans of P&C games and lovers of good surreal stories/worlds/characters.

I played the original game and the story is awesome but this versions has a lot of game play problems. First, you can't click in an area and make the character walk to there. You must guide him with you finger like this was an action game, which it is not. This is boring and annoying and hides your vision of the scenario. Second, you can't zoom. That, in game like this, is really bad and, in a mobile screen, you loose all the details. Finally, it's really hard to interact with the objects.

I LOVE THIS GAME!!!! i used to play it when i was younger and when i couldn't load the original game on my laptop, i was so glad i found this in the app store!! I bought it right away!! Thanks for making it available on my tablet and phone!! Im really enjoying this game. Nostalgia at its best.. brings back memories!!
The game is phenomenal, love the story and all. Conversion from a computer game leaves the controls a bit difficult and everything is very tiny for a phone screen
I am super stoked this game was brought back in app form. One of my childhood favorites. Thank you soooo much!!!
The only issue I've noticed is that sometimes, it's hard to "use" an item-- but that may must be operator error. ;) Pretty addicting.
been meaning to play this for years. thanks for a great port.

Haven't played this game since a demo disc as a kid. Good controls, well done hint system. I'm so glad to see this on here. Good price. Worth every penny. Good job guys! If you could try to put in a speech volume, it would be amazing. Hard to hear sometimes.
Definitely enjoying it so far. leaving 4 stars instead of 5 because the controls are "clunky".. also.. the item select tends to glitch.
wont let me play. keeps failing while unpacking files... wish you could fix this or please refund me. i really was excited on playing it too

Loved every minute. Movement controls are a little clunky but it's still very fun. I laughed, was scared, was disgusted, and ultimately very much enjoyed unravelling the story. Definitely keeping it for a second or third playthrough.
grate!
I couldn't believe this was made this game into an app! I use to play this all the time growing up. This made my day!

I was hesitant purchasing this game because it was 4 dollars and I haven't found a point and click adventure since Bertram Fiddle and The Inner World that captivates me the way they had. This game is no disappointment. The story is engaging and creepy and the game itself is fun. I know this game was out years ago but it still outshines many newer games.
gives a great atmosphere vibe

I played this game years ago and always wished i could finish it. i found it here and found it played better than the original. thank you so much for bringing this game to mobile, i love it. this is a direct port so expect things like voice acting to on par with the games back in the day.
Thank you ! For bringing this gem to AOS
such nostalgia!!!! Thank you so much for making this old gem available for android!!!!!! 10 Stars!!!
Amazing, just like the PC game.
Great game

Very fun game, especially for an app. Controls are nice, puzzles are fun, plot is interesting. The text boxes sometimes disappear instantly before the character is done speaking, but most of it can be re-read, so this does not affect gameplay.
We need more old school point and click games like this on Google Play. Just an all around good example of what can be done for older games with great gameplay.

I bought this game mostly for nostalgic reasons, having played it years ago. The game itself is great, even if it isn't the best example of the genre. Unfortunately, the controls are terrible and a bit glitchy. No attempt has been made to update the controls for touch devices, making gameplay cumbersome and imprecise. There are also a number of glitches (in particular, inventory items getting stuck in selected mode, preventing the character from moving).
Haven't played this in 20 years.
After fumbling with the controls for a bit, I fell headfirst into this madness. I truly appreciate the fact this game's on mobile! I never would have played this classic otherwise!

Enjoy the game. Was happy to see it on here, being I work IT overnight, have a lot of down time, and gravitate to phone games. my only real issue is the controls. They're servicable, but lacking. I know it's a niche game, but if you would take the time to implement touch controls, this is the sort of game that would benefit greatly from it.

I think this game is great. but on dpad options please make it fixed position / can be customized. im using mouse to enjoy play this game. because when on the conversation, the button is too small and my finger block the screen when i choose drag movement options.
Great game, brings back lots of memories. Would give it 5 stars, but some dialog boxes finish before the characters are finished speaking, so you don't know what's said. Other than that, its great
app isnt opening shuts down right away
I had this game on PC. Loved it then, love it now.
A bit confusing at first because it is different to games I've played. But I persevered and I love it

love the story and the puzzles but moving around can be tiresome sometimes. wish i could adjust the sfx and speech independently coz the sfx are too loud(eg. the swingset sqeaking) and the voices too soft.
Love the story line. Graphics are good. Moving around is awkward, could use some tweeking on the amount of finger movement required to move in all directions. Your hand blocks the screen too much.
Excellent adventure game from the 80s, why aren't more developers making pc ports?
great to play this game again, just as good as I remember. have had a few crashes and glitches, but still def worth a playthrough!
great atmosphere, slightly shonky controls. Probably better on a tablet

Game was ported from pc. It is the type of exploring and finding solutions in your journey. The levels that you explore are not suited for kids due to dead bodies and examples like deformed children. For example there a girl with two wooden legs jumping cord somewhere. Thats f... up. Overall it is a verry and i mean a verry good game for a mobile game. Graphics are ok, donwside sometimes screen is small and spoting things aint obvious. Worth buying 100% im not lying. Simmilar to Fallout 2 game
need a remaster for console
Pure nostalgia.
well done
Played it on PC in the 90s. Still a great game
Perfect point and click adventure game, with a dark twist. I loved playing this...

I love this type of game i cannot get enough of them. This beauuuty maybe from a couple of decades or more ago but it doesn't make a difference its still engaging and entertaining more so than some of todays offerings! Its worth every penny they kindly never charged. So if u enjoy thinking outside the box or indeed even under the box this is perfect & im well pleased to have found it. Thanks guys u ROCK.
Wish there were more like it for Android!
Having a glitch with the LG v35. All menus have a weird blue background and the gameplay itself has like a dark yellow shader discoloring the screen.
Never thought Id find this Classic PC game from my youth in the Mobile Store! Just as terrifyingly nightmarish as i remember! Thanks EMU!
This game has always been cool, I dig being able to play it on the train and stuff, good work as always DotEmu.

This game is a classic so I'm very glad you ported it over but, it breaks the home function on my LG G 5 so that any time I push the home button it asks what launcher I want to use .... Just would be easy 5 star if fixed glitches

Hindered by eyesight. At 47 and on a 8 inch screen this title is too easy to miss details. I started it, enjoyed it, but can't finish it due to the details. 1.4 GB is a lot of space. Maybe later when I have time and space, is a keeper though.
Great game. Played it on the PC in the golden age of adventure games so didn't remember how excellent it is. Unique. Thank you so much for working so hard to get it on android. Take note Sierra.
Awesome game. Great gameplay, story, and mechanics. Keep it up!
Brilliant game good story and some great puzzles all in all two thumbs up!!
Freakishly Bizarre! A must play.
Thank you for porting this game!
Goog game
It's freaking Sanitarium.... ON MY PHONE! SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY
O don't know how this is going to be but I think I'll like it

This game is awesome. I used to hate point and click, seeking things game but not this one because it's different from all those boring point and click android games out there. It has great story which you must have put so much effort in . Characters dialogues are so cool and funny , more than just : I gotta get out of here , blah blah..... No complaint at all. .just love it
Good port of a great and unique classic!
Excellent game (never got to play it on PC). Despite a few control issues, everything was great on a Note 8 with the S pen, no glitches, bugs or crashes.
Very good game from my childhood.

I absolutely love this game! Thank you devs for the port! Running this on a Note 8. The control options are adequate and perfectly functional (I've been playing with both), but using the S-pen (or any stylus) is so much easier. The graphics are as good as I remember. Well worth the asking price.
I never got to finish when I have it on my PC, but I was ecstatic when I heard it was available on mobile.
The classic game portable with more features what's not to love?
Used to play this on PC when I was a kid. I love this game

A unique psychological thriller point and click adventure very reminiscent 
of the mid 90's, with gameplay that emulates astoundingly well to mobile 
platforms. A must play for fans of horror and point-and-click adventures!

It's the first time I'm playing this game, and it's whole world and 
atmosphere is really unique. It's one of these rare games that immerse you 
completely and hours can go by without you understanding, so if you are 
skeptical over whether or not you'll get into it, believe me, if you enjoy 
a good story and great characters go for it. It's truly amazing, but there 
is the problem of the somewhat clunky controls. Basically you have to hold 
down your finger to make the character walk, so if you want to go up you'll 
be covering the screen with your hand. You should be able to walk by 
tapping. I also experienced some glitches and the game froze a couple of 
times, but it's no big deal if you save often. In the end Sanitarium is a 
truly fantastic game, and the devs did a great job porting it to Android. 
With a few control tweaks and bug fixes, it's gonna be perfect, though it's 
already 100% playable!

I dont understand why the graphics are bad. Everything becomes clear for a 
brief second when I press the home button Great game though

It's great overall but would benefit from an on-screen controller or 
clicking to walk to where you click, rather than dragging around

I started playing this game while i was in schooll on a pc. unfortunately 
because of a scratch on the cd i could not go past ch 01!!! i was overjoyed 
to find this game again on android! felt relly nostalgic! my fav game of 
all times!!! Thwnk you!!

Up to now enjoying it . I recommend people playing it on a smaller phone to 
change the control scheme to 'pad'. It's not perfect, it still seems you 
going back down stairs you just come up sometimes.

A great game that anyone who likes adventure games and a dark setting 
should play. For the game itself I would give 5 stars but sadly my whole 
game has a weird blue tint over it. When I press the home button I can see 
the game how it's supposed to look for a moment but other than that it has 
a green/grey layer on top of it and the icons are in the same blue as the 
opening credit. I couldn't find any help online but I dont seem to be the 
only one experiencing this bug. Hope it can be adressed, will definitely 
give 5 stars if it does

The game is great and plays relatively fine but almost every time I click 
on something it brings me out the app and loads dodgy adverts in chrome. 
Pretty disappointing considering this is a paid for gane. And in turn half 
the time it causes the game to crash. I feel like inevitably this game will 
lead to a virus or a scan being accidentally clicked. Pretty shamefull.

This was an interesting trip! Highly recommend! Try "American Mcgees Alice" 
after this, if you liked this one!!

Absolutely classical games that still holds up well today. The app works 
very well and I'd highly recommend it to anyone.
Fun game, glad to see it on the app store

Graphics and storyline are just as I remember from the PC game. But cannot 
figure out the phone controls and there is no manual. Searched Google and I 
cannot find a tutorial on how to use the Android controls. Help please!!
A little glitchy. But overall interesting game. I dig it.

Sometimes the character doesn't finish talking, gets cut in the 
middle(mostly near the end) or sometimes just at the beginning(it's 100% 
problem on your end), And the music doesn't turn off when I push the 
shutdown button, if you fix the first problem(which is a big problem for an 
adventure game with such plot) Its really a huge problem it skips dialogs, 
I won't give it above 1 star till it fixed I use one plus one
Best nostalgic game ever!

I played this years ago, and was so stoked to find it in the app store. One 
of my 10 all time favorite games.
Best tablet game I have played so far.
Reliveing the past, good graphics.

I remember this on PC years ago I'm so glad it's here,but on my galaxy S9 the colors on it are all messed up the screen has a green tint to it and the in game buttons are blue, the cut scenes are bluish green in color. I hope that this can get fixed becuase I really want to enjoy it again. 5 stars when it's fixed.
Great game, but having some trouble with the dialogs skipping without me touching anything, hope to see this bug fixed
The controls are absolutely unusable on a phone screen.

MAJOR BUG - If you have multiple launchers installed it somehow removes your default launcher setting.  If you open any app and then hit the home button it will always ask you which launcher to use.  LGV30

I've encountered a very annoying bug and am forced to uninstall. Every time I close the app or press my home button my phone (note 4) prompts me to select a default for my hole launcher. So I went into the default apps and for some reason this app is in the default home launcher. Every single time I click my home button it pops up to ask me what launcher I want to use. I had to uninstall the app just to use my normal home launcher. Please fix or grant me a refund. I'm very disappointed and would love to play this.
Absolutely amazing.. relived my younger days playing this and loved every second. Only thing that sucks is how hard it is to "click" on small things (my God, thinking about a certain puzzle...)
Great throwback!
Love this game

Great game and can't believe I missed out on this get back in the day. I would put this in the must own category for Android games. The down side is that it takes up 1.5gb on my phone but I have the space. Great port.
Bought. Stopped working. After uninstalling it now says it's not compatible with my phone. Galaxy s7

Aside from occasional crashes and dodgy target-boxes for items the game runs okay. My main problem is that on my S5 the game interferes with the homescreen. It appears as an additional homescreen option in the default programs and makes it impossible to set any other homescreen apps as default. Had to uninstal it due to this.
A great game.....need more.
Crashed my phone. Would like refund but can't find refund button?????
Please fix this game breaking my home button functionality with nova launcher, uninstalled for now

Such an original great game.  Attention to detail was spot on. Cinematics were great with creepy story and creepy characters. Older style game but the graphics are really well done. With so many crappy games out there that rely too much on graphics that they completely lack in any sort of meaningful game play, i'll stick to the older style thanks. One bug though and that is that when i go to close the game or use another app, it asks if i want to use 'touchwiz' or 'touchwiz something', i can't remember. And this only started happening when i downloaded this game, so looking for a fix please. Other than that, excellent.
Awesome so far
Needs some minor bug fixes. Sometimes the dialogs are cut even though i didn't press. Overall a classic game. Love it.

The addition of a "clickable object" highlighter will help you find the smaller items that tend to blend into the background.  NOTE FOR THE DEVS: My Galaxy Note 5 started asking me yesterday to "select launcher" with the options "touchwiz home" or "touchwiz easy home" every time I pressed the home button. I googled the problem and people said to go into settings > applications > default applications > home, and to delete the app that didn't belong to fix the problem. Next to "touchwiz home" and "touchwiz easy home" was "Sanitarium".   I don't know what caused this, if an update you sent out caused it, or something Samsung did caused it or if me downloading a new app yesterday caused it. Just wanted to let you know why I might delete the app. Nothing to do with the game, this pop up is just really annoying.
Very nice. Same as twenty years ago. Controls are OK, just tap here and there and you'll soon figure it out.
I played and completed the original PC version of this game several times over. I'm so happy it's on mobile now. This was one of my favorite games as a kid, And I still love it now.
WOW, I never dreamed this would be recreated one day. Thank you soooo much for making this available on android.  It stays true to even the opening videos I saw wen i launch the game back in 98.
This game makes you come and come
How do you open the inventory?
loved this game back on the pc. the touch pad controls suck balls. can't make it past the towel in the very begining. really disapointed.
Great atmosphere and interesting, memorable, characters.

I've always wanted to play this game and am incredibly with everything. The only small issue is if you're playing with a tablet that has a keyboard that can connect it will close the App and will not let you movie the main character with the mouse or log you out if you try. But it's still worth the purchase and I highly recommend for any horror fans!

Played this when I was younger but never made it all the way through. Finally did, and it's a great game. I didn't really have any glitches or trouble playing at all. It is worth spending actual money on this.
Played the original,so far so good...
It looks good. I haven't actually played it yet, but I love the style that only PC games from 1990 time period can give.
Took me around 30 tries to install it!! Even after they said they fixed the bug... yeah sure... Other than that the game still looks nice and creepy today.

1998 my uncle borrowed me the pc game, for 1 weeks... Couldn't stop thinking about it, I have Googled it many times in the past years, and when I found out I can play it on my phone, OMG I was so happy!  Great game!!! Thank you so much

You get maximum points for full screen options. There's many games on play store that don't offer that and they leave you stuck with annoying bars on side. Keep up the great work with options in your games. btw there's a bug where sometimes dialogue will skip and you'll need to select it again but sometimes you can't repeat so you miss what character says. Please fix.

Great port to mobile, sometimes selecting dialogue options can be a pain (bigger fonts would be nice unless I've missed it) but otherwise, excellent classic game with fully voiced dialogue too which was still kinda rare for this kinda game at the time unless, again, I'm mistaken.
I played this when I was a kid at that time it was on the PC I bet it is just didn't think I'd see this game ever again I LOVE IT....üíôüíúüíõüíö
This game is a perfect port. Fun to play, perfect autosave. A fun and bizarre treat.
LOVE IT...I've played way too many time to count, never gets boring
This game is awesome.  Just like on my computer.  Sometimes a little hard to navigate but still great.
& ported exceptionally. No complaints whatsoever.

This version is the android unaltered, unfettered, incredibly honest sanitarium you played back in 98.  The only minor negative is that the control of the game, though ported to android is still very  much so dependant on the tip of an arrow shaped cursor so it gets difficult to refine your tap zones.  Otherwise, perfect.  Keep up these excellent endeavours and android/Linux will begin to compete heavily in the gaming industry.  Great job DotEmu.

I play on a 4.5 inch screen, which tends to make some small details on the environment very hard to click (and they might be critical to advance the game). A zoom gesture would be nice.  Also, at random times some lines of dialog are skipped before they finish. Sometimes you can replay them to see what was missed, but it is moderately annoying.  Otherwise a very nice game.

The controls are ridiculous. Many times I would click on something multiple times and get stuck. Would then go to a walkthrough and find I was clicking on the right area, just not in the exact spot. I could see this game being way more fun and user friendly on a PC.

DEVELOPER NEEDS TO READ THE REVIEW COMMENTS. There are a number of us that have red screen borders and the rest of the screen is tinted blue. It's so bad that it's unplayable. Suggested fix of enabling 4xMSAA by another user does not work. Want a fix, or otherwise a refund.
Second level, everytime he has a flashback, it force closes. Note5. I was so excited to find this game, plz fix!!
Good old Sanitarium. No problems. Great game.
I loved this game when it was PC. This really brought me back to the late 90's. Great and fun adventure game.

One problem I have is that there is a color glitch that doesn't clear up and it makes the colors look faded as if there is a blue filter over the screen. It will clear up for a split sec when I press the volume buttons but goes right back to looking blue and faded. Also all my action buttons are red such As the hand, eye and menu buttons. I am on Marshmallow 6.01 on an LG GPad X8.0 with no special gfx tweaks. Please fix. (Found a temp fix: Go to Dev options and enable force 4x MSAA)
Good times
My fav childhood game. Apsolutelly fantastic! Hope to see sequels.... !!

Everytime I come of this game, and load it up the guy doesn't move at all and it freezes and then I have to reset my phone to get it to work and I had to make a new game because it just wouldn't load it's a shame really because I was getting into it I want my money back! I've deleted this :/

I went into this thinking it'd be a nostalgic and creepy adventure but while it Was both, the creep factors only in the beginning and nostalgia wore off after remembering the somewhat cumbersome controls. Only the graphics hold up (ARPG type) but none of this should steer you away as it is a fun game to play and has an interesting story (done before the amnesia thing was over done) if you can get over the old controls (updated a bit) than you'll still have a great experience of all kinds of genres

Crashes at startup on Galaxy S7 Edge.  Every time.  Edit post comment from developer below:  I have tried reinstalling several times.  Just tried again.  I have now sent an email to the address below.   Will update this review if there is any progress.
replyContent:
Hello,

Could you please try to uninstall and reinstall the game? Sometimes, files get corrupted during the download process, resulting in unknown bugs and issues. 

If you still encounter this issue, please send an email at support@dotemu.com.

Thank you for your understanding.

content: This is a great blast from the past that still stands the test of time. I never finished it on pc back then so am excited to be playing it now. The only complaint I have is that clicking on text options is mega frustrating at least on my s7 edge. The options are too small and too close and the tap  doest register unless u really hit the characters on the text precisely. This can lead to frantically tapping it until it gets it also resulting in skipping dialogue accidentally.
Classic Game. It's like a great nightmare.

I played this game many years ago on PC. When I saw it here I picked it up immediately. It plays well and is everything I remembered. Fantastically creepy story, worlds, and characters, topped off with challenging puzzles. I recommend this for any fan of horror and puzzles.
I played this long ago on the pc and I am glad I found it again
Loved the game when I played it on the computer and I love it when it's now conceivently on my phone.
Classic game, great feel. Only downside imo are the hard to hit dialog options. Or maybe I just have fat fingers.

It has glitches it would not download to my samsung note 8 tablet after 5 attempts it did, It downloaded on my lg tribute 5 the 1st try. It's a great port though thank you you guys are doing a great job.
Fun time killer.. second to last level pissed me off so I quit. Prepare for a ton of wandering and trying to figure out puzzles with no help
Some of the controls are frustrating, but the game is long, and not too easy!
Really good game

I'm so happy this is available! Thank you thank you! Only issue is sometimes when i click on a dialogue option, there is no audio and i only see the text for about a second, then i goes back to the dialogue selection screen.

Only barely started it and uninstalled again, I think it's maybe it's just the mood I was in but I wasn't feeling it. However the controls, graphics and sound are all great and I appreciate the old school vibe.

They did a great job with this classic. Sadly, did find a bug. Chapter 2, after the fight in the patch, gate won't open to new area. Can't continue the game as a result. Luckily I stagger my saves, but I don't know if the bug will happen again.
Sanitarium was a game i played on my PC years ago. I'm glad it's back. It's an awesome game in a creepy way.
a respectful treatment for this timeless classic
Game is amazing. I played this years ago on my PC. So far no glitches. Thanks for bringing this to my android tablet!!
Maybe save points should have timestamps?
Sweet

It requires deleting almost every other game you own AFTER you download it - even if you save it to your SD & have over 13gbs available, on SD & 2gb available on your system, this game will begin unpacking around 560mb of files & you will have to continue removing apps to make it fit. So it looks like an OK game, but the tradeoff takes a lot of the shine of it. (Lenovo tab)
Very good and very compelling
Works great on note 4. Great game

Never got to finish the PC version so am going to give this a shot. Some of the older games are pretty good. Like 7th Guest and 11th Hour, Sanitarium keeps your brain thinking while allowing your body to relax. Haven't started it yet but hope it runs well and  the graphics are decent on my phone. Will let you know if they're not. UPDATE, I just started playing and works fine thus far on my Galaxy J7. Different from using a mouse but I'm sure I'll get used to it. Great work developing it for small screens!

Used to love this game, got it from gog, buggy as hell as in you have to restart it entirely due to game destroying glitches, so thought the android port would be better.  I was wrong.  Don't waste your money!  I would ask for a refund but there is no option for it on the playstore for this specific game.
Loves it play it on my pc. Now got it for my tablet.
Android N Beta Preview DP5.  Game does not allow for picking up object. Uninstalled.
After I got the first orb, the game started crashing and putting me back to the first square, no matter how many times I tried to continue ue. Sure wish I could have seen the final chapter.
Great atmospheric artwork & music; enthralling plot; clever puzzles yet not too difficult; Enjoyed playing this very much.üëç
Excelent
Loved it as a PC game, and am enjoying it again.
Love this game but had to redownload..so cant get to whr i left off..i have all achievements but its making me start over...can any1 tell me how if i can return to chapter6..
When you jump in the hole after timber in chapter 4 it crashes. Please fix soon, I love this game
I had trouble forcing myself to play this game on pc. This android port made my day.
what the last person's review said.
Good game.  Makes you think.  Creepy so if you do not like that kind of game maybe you would not like it.
Great game, but dialogue cuts out pretty frequently
Flawless and such a great classic PC game that still holds up today!
Great port of the game. Enjoying a disturbing trip down memory lane ‚ò∫
Classic mobilized.

I'm super happy to play this on my phone after about a decade of wanting to play it on pc however the colour is messed up. The game has a blue hue to it, main menu is all blue coloured and in game it is hard to see stuff. I'm running it on a Samsung galaxy s3 gt-i9300. Would love some feedback on this. Many thanks!
Was going great until chapter 3 when I try to interact with the control panel next to the doctors office please fix this bug

This game brings back memories of Wenden it first came out in 1998. It's still a blast to play and luckily I forgot a lot of the puzzles so I have to figure it all out again, which is what I wanted lol.
Really? I have plenty of space. Why is this telling me i have none... fix this please

content: Are the best ones

It is as awesome a game as when I used to play it on my computer, but now even better that I can play it anywhere that I want to now that I can play it on my phone!  Could you adapt the Puzz 3D jigsaw puzzles that came out on the PC in the nineties for the Android phone. That would be so awesome if you could!
Great port of one of my favourite adventure games. Plays almost exactly as on pc. If you loved it on your computer you'll love it now
Frickin awesome!
The android game play takes a little getting used to but doesn't detract from clue hunting!
Other than it not working with Nvidia Shield Gamemapper a great port. One of the best in the point and click genre.
Freeze playing hide n seek had to start from scratch title :(

Sanitarium before you expect people to buy your games you should make sure they can get are found   people are wasting there money  that  they have earned  repeat this game does not a down load I won't arefound
Just as amazing as I remember it!
So glad you came out with this game! I absolutely loved it on PC.
Crashes Too Much

Sanitarium more than delivers in terms of plot and puzzles, with the graphics still being more than passable. The control scheme can make some parts of the game a bit annoying, but not to a degree that would ruin the experience
Just as I remembered it
It is amazing how a good game can be ruined because of the lack of good controls!!! They made a really good game a really annoying thing to play!!!
After finally getting it to unpack. I got to play and I did enjoy it

5 stars BC the game is among my favorite all time.  Game crashed 2x but I was changing apps for a FAQ and it auto saves constantly so not a problem.  Manual saves take maybe 3 seconds.  Some sections can be very difficult w/multiple touch screen points so close.
Wouldn't unpack files although there is plenty of free memory, got to 99% and failed each time. Shame, really want to play this!
I use to play this game on my windows 98 pc!!! Im extremely happy with this mobile copy. I find it works best with a stylus.
Once the Downloader got fixed I'm able to play with no issues. This game is great!
Used to play when i was 14 love as much then as i do now
It's a weird little adventure. I don't know where it's going to take me, but the controls seem fine and the plot so far is interesting and fresh.
Want my money back
Just as said......AWESOME!!!!!!!!

When I first downloaded this app, there was a bug and I was unable to open it or play it at all- very annoying. BUT, the issue was quickly fixed and I even got a message letting me know it had been resolved. Great service! Since I have started playing, I'm really enjoying it. The puzzles are a good level of difficulty; tough enough that I feel a sense of accomplishment when I work it out, but not so tough that I rage out :-)

content: I've downloaded the initial 500mb file and its installed fine...then when I try to run says not enough space and shows a progress bar which doesn't do anything and says resources can't be found...my phone is an Samsung s5...I have 2gb of space left on my phone....so I moved app to SD card which has 9gb free..and still the same message...so I need to know what's going on with this and how to fix it please! Also cleared cache for app and no joy!
Was looking forward to this but once downloaded it did not download the resources at all stayed at 0mg or whatever kb it was disappointed

content: Download the game, try to install it to download the resources for the game and it fails to download!!!! It says "Download failed because the resources could not be found" Great update!!
Was really looking forward to playing this game but it will not work! It gets to 17% of unpacking files before saying unpacking files failed! Please help I want to play!
Absolutely thrilled that this obscure point and click adventure is out on Android. I bought this game when it came out and it creeped the hell out of me. I'm so happy to be able to play it again.
I played this game many years ago and to see it ported made me super happy. Will be back soon with an updated rating.
Brilliant port. Controls not the same but as best as you can get on a touchscreen. Worth every penny.
No idea how to work it. Voices are poor. So upset I spent money on this. A lot of money!

This is truly an amazing game. By far the best mobile game i have played. Sure the controls can be a bit of a pain and sure the game is old school. But not at all enough to deter u from playing the game. Actually much easier to play if u have a phone with a pointer. Great job guys. Amazing. I only wish there were so many more like it...

This was my first point and click adventure and 17 years later, I've played some good games but nothing ever compared to the head trip. When I saw this in the Google play store, it's indecent to explain h how excited I am.
This was one of my favorite games when I was a kid. Android port is solid, plays just like the original game.
I enjoyed this game immensely. Thanks.
The controls are crappy.  Too many conversations to get through.  And I could not get a refund after 45 seconds of play.

I love this game, but I have run into a problem. The icons on the game disappear and I cannot move around. It is at the point where Max is at the courtyard chapter. I go to put on the vinyl disc and that's when the icons disappear and I have no movement. Please fix.
Keep up the great work.
Dunno if my system update sorted out the problem or what but.....
Tried to uninstall this rubbish game and not letting me. Telling me to do it later. WHY.
Awesome game

The port works great for the most part, but I have a problem with the color palette. Whenever I try to play, everything gets this blueish color and parts of the game that should be black are displayed in red. Any solution to this? Thanks a lot! Playing from a Samsung Galaxy S3.

Looking for a good story with great adventure, creativity, and a test of ones problem solving skills....this looks like a Diablo game for people who are not familiar with it, but is more a "point and click" puzzle game that takes place in some really creepy dungeon like maps/levels. Not scary, but strange and creepy. Good story...stick with it, by middle of level I was hooked. Ran perfect on my S3
I love this game. I played this game along time ago on my computer and I was so excited when I found it as an app. Great job.
Won't download resources it says. Want refund! I'm still waiting for my refund.
Well ported for the device, I am in chapter 6 and have only had one glitch involving getting stuck in a doorway, not a big deal. Please see about bringing "Torment" the rpg to android devices!
The best port of an older game I have seen so far. One of best games I have ever played on pc and now on my phone.
Excellent game brought back to life.

A game I played along time ago before playing Diablo 1 on PC. To actually seeing this game ported to the Android brings back memories for me. A point and click adventure with deep a storyline. Just play through the "Abandoned Children" story and you'll be hooked afterwards.
love it
Just a while ago remembered about this. And here it is. A must buy for all great story fans.
Just finished the game,no problems what so ever,5* from me
I loved this game as a kid and it was nice to play it as an adult and still love it!! They don't make games like these anymoreüòü
Too hard to control. Got through the first level, but won't waste time trying to maneuver the whole game. Would love a refund.
All better now!  Tx emu!Fails to install...says unpacking files failed....emailed twice w no response.  Gonna ask for refund soon. Nexus 9. Marshmallow.

content: Love it so far.
Samsung Galaxy Tab 2. Free space is 2 GB external and 0.6 GB internal. Do I have to free internal space?
replyContent:
Hello,

Try to update to the latest version.
If you encounter the same issue, try to free some space in the internal memory (the game needs ~1.4GB to extract data).

Regards,
DotEmu.

content: So happy to see this game on android  in fact I'm starting to notice more and more of these older pc games I love it brings me back and there all done with the same taste and style as before the 90's are back it may be only enjoyed by the older crowd but who knows anyway great game hope to see more of them as time goes on  (kings quest, phantasmagoria and possibly the old claymation games) "oldy but goodys"
DotEmu, I want to thank you for this! A very well done port.
All this game needs now to bring it into the new Era is CLOUD SAVE, it won't be 5‚òÜ without it
Loving the game!
This is one of the best games of all time and if I had to play it this way I would, but the controls are a little clunky. It isn't unplayable by any means, but it's much easier on my computer.
Cool game.Working great.
Still needs controller support. A few glitches here and there like can we at least get an option for a lockable vpad.
This game bring back so much memories. Love it! Plays extremely well!
The greatest point and click horror game ever created.
Once you get to the Hive chapter it gets weird and strange. I still couldn't get past the dragon fly part in the hive... I even with a walkthrough!
Grab it!
The very best horror game is here!
